message: Hey ladies! I am still looking for a subleaser for the spring of 2017 semester (that's next semester already what). If you know of anyone who need housing for spring through part of summer, or even just spring, please let me know ASAP! Living in the lighthouse has been an amazing experience for gospel housing!!! I will miss it while I am gone! For details about pricing and logistics just text me or message me. 763-234-5586
